title: Database of Pacific Religions
description: Pulotu, meaning abode of the gods, is a database of Austronesian religious beliefs and practices. You will find information on more than 130 cultures from the Moken of mainland Asia to the Maori of New Zealand.
citation: Watts J., Sheehan O., Greenhill S.J., Gomes-Ng S., Atkinson Q.D., Bulbulia J., Gray R.D. (2015). Pulotu: Database of Austronesian Supernatural Beliefs and Practices. PLoS ONE 10(9). DOI: https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0136783
